name: Sunshower
storyline:
Ah, the rain… it’s so peaceful… until it washes away everything?!

When the rain starts and nobody else seems to mind that it destroys everything in its path, help save the world by scooping up the rain with the help of a plant-topped robot, and use the game’s borders to bounce their plant vines around for better angles.

Watch out for special rain drops that might restore broken ground, stay alert for faster speeds, take note of strange messages, enjoy music that blends retro and modern sounds, and get lost in a colorful art style that combines pixel art with traditionally drawn watercolors.
summary: When the rain starts and nobody else seems to mind that it destroys everything in its path, one plant-topped robot answers the call in this rainy-day arcade survival game.
